name: Block Blaster: 15 weapons
description:
My first game ever to be released to the public, and it's a hastily put together 24h game jam game... Yaay.. 

But hey, I guess everyone needs to start somewhere!

This game has you going through a maze, where you can find 15 different weapons and you can hold two at once for maximum stopping power! List of weapons include:

- Revolver
- Pistol
- Assault rifle
- Sniper rifle
- SMG
- HMG
- Shotgun
- Grenade launcher (grenadelaun)
- Rocket launcher
- Grenade
- Laser blaster
- Bow
- Crossbow (cbow)
- Anti-tank rifle (antitank)
- Dartgun
